bass.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a very low male singing voice, or a man with a voice like this
bass.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the part of a musical work that is written for a singer with a bass voice
bass.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the lower half of the whole range of musical notes
bass.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: The band features Johnson on bass (=playing the bass guitar).
bass.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a bass instrument or voice produces low notes
bass.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a fish that can be eaten and lives in both rivers and the sea
